stockmarket.model

Interface Portfolio

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioModel, SQLPortfolioModel

    public interface Portfolio
    An interface defining the methods of a stock portfolio object.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    craig

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigDecimal getCashBalance()
      Returns the cash balance available to purchase stocks.
      java.math.BigDecimal getChangeInNetWorth()
      Returns the change in net worth since the creation of this portfolio.
      java.math.BigDecimal getNetWorth()
      Returns the net worth of this portfolio.
      java.lang.String getPortfolioName()
      Returns the name of this portfolio.
      java.util.List<OwnedStock> getStockList()
      Returns the list of stocks owned by this portfolio.
      java.math.BigDecimal getTotalStockValue()
      Returns the total value of all the stocks in this portfolio.
      void setCashBalance(java.math.BigDecimal cashBalance)
      Sets the cash balance, the amount of money available to purchase stocks.
      void setChangeInNetWorth(java.math.BigDecimal changeInNetWorth)
      Sets the change in net worth since this portfolio was created.
      void setNetWorth(java.math.BigDecimal netWorth)
      Sets the net worth of this portfolio, the combined total of the total value of the stocks and the cash balance.
      void setPortfolioName(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Sets the name of this portfolio.
      void setStockList(java.util.List<OwnedStock> stockList)
      Sets the list of stocks owned by this portfolio.
      void setTotalStockValue(java.math.BigDecimal totalStockValue)
      Sets the total value of the stocks in this portfolio.
